title: 2021 Academy Awards

author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew Socey discuss The Academy Award results with Craig Mince (Artistic Director of Indy Film Fest) and about IFF. He also reviews The Virtuoso and three South African action films from the 1980s.
